title: What is the truth?
description: Iโve been eating from this restaurant for more than 10 years. Thereโs been a long history of 2 rivals with the same name of this restaurant but with different address. Regardless of who is the first to start selling this, thereโs great efforts from the rival of this shop to constantly trying leave a bad name to this shop. This shopโs food is always fresh and tasty, i just ordered an hour ago and itโs as fresh as eating at the shop (provided that you eat immediately). I saw many bad reviews and I questioned their authenticity as many of the reviews never talk about how they complained to the shop, what was the response of the shop, was there a refund, etc. Just plain complaining about bad food from here. So you can tell these are people trying to create bad reviews for the sake of smearing bad name to this shop. Im from Singapore, just come to***to travel once in a while.

title: Spice Bistro - Thแบฃo ฤiแปn
description:
After my previous mediocre experiences with my wife, I decided to go out and try this restaurant again tonight.

For the appetizer, we chose "Met 3 Mien." The servers somehow tilted the trace when serving our dishes, spilling all of the fish sauce on our table and my wife's clothes.

The Waiter didn't even apologize to us before quickly wiping out the spot and disappearing behind the screen.

We decided to leave the dinner and request the bill because the fish sauce left an unpleasant odor on my wife's and her branded clothing.

We don't want to drag this incident out until we ask to speak with the Supervisor. The last thing that triggered us was the Supervisor's attempt to shield the impolite employee by claiming he didn't mean to do it in front of us; instead, she could professionally apologize and accept the mistake in the Waiter's presence as well.

We didn't want to ask for compensation because we hadn't discussed the value of our damage. Nonetheless, we were disappointed by the Waiter's lack of professionalism and the Supervisor's rude attempt to cover for their employees.

If they don't change and improve their service, I won't recommend it to anyone.
